verses.verse: My son, <S%H1121><s%> don't <S%H7911><s%> forget my teaching; <S%H8451><s%> but let your heart <S%H3820><s%> keep <S%H5341><s%> my commandments: <S%H4687><s%>
for length <S%H753><s%> of days, <S%H3117><s%> and years <S%H8141><s%> of life, <S%H2416><s%> and peace, <S%H7965><s%> will they add to you. <S%H3254><s%>

Don't <S%H2617><s%> let kindness and truth <S%H571><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> you. <S%H7194><s%> Bind them around your neck. <S%H1621><s%> Write <S%H3789><s%> them on the tablet <S%H3871><s%> of your heart. <S%H3820><s%>
So you will find <S%H4672><s%> favor, <S%H2580><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> understanding <S%H7922><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> and man. <S%H120><s%>
Trust <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with all your heart, <S%H3820><s%> and don't <S%H8172><s%> lean on your own understanding. <S%H998><s%>
In all your ways <S%H1870><s%> acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> him, <S%H734><s%> and he will make your paths straight. <S%H3474><s%>
Don't <S%H2450><s%> be wise in your own eyes. <S%H5869><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil. <S%H7451><s%>
It will be health <S%H7500><s%> to your body, <S%H8270><s%> and nourishment <S%H8250><s%> to your bones. <S%H6106><s%>
Honor <S%H3513><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with your substance, <S%H1952><s%> with the first fruits <S%H7225><s%> of all your increase: <S%H8393><s%>
so your barns <S%H618><s%> will be filled <S%H4390><s%> with plenty, <S%H7647><s%> and your vats <S%H3342><s%> will overflow <S%H6555><s%> with new wine. <S%H8492><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> don't <S%H3988><s%> despise Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s discipline, <S%H4148><s%> neither be weary <S%H6973><s%> of his reproof: <S%H8433><s%>
for whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> loves, <S%H157><s%> he reproves; <S%H3198><s%> even as a father <S%H1><s%> reproves the son <S%H1121><s%> in whom he delights. <S%H7521><s%>
Happy <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> who finds <S%H4672><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> the man <S%H120><s%> who gets <S%H6329><s%> understanding. <S%H8394><s%>
For her good profit <S%H5504><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than getting <S%H5505><s%> silver, <S%H3701><s%> and her return <S%H8393><s%> is better than fine gold. <S%H2742><s%>
She is more precious <S%H3368><s%> than rubies. <S%H6443><s%> None of the things you can desire <S%H2656><s%> are to be compared to her. <S%H7737><s%>
Length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> is in her right hand. <S%H3225><s%> In her left hand <S%H8040><s%> are riches <S%H6239><s%> and honor. <S%H3519><s%>
Her ways <S%H1870><s%> are ways <S%H1870><s%> of pleasantness. <S%H5278><s%> All her paths <S%H5410><s%> are peace. <S%H7965><s%>
She is a tree <S%H6086><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> to those who lay hold <S%H2388><s%> of her. <S%H833><s%> Happy is everyone who retains her. <S%H8551><s%>
By wisdom <S%H2451><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> founded <S%H3245><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%> By understanding, <S%H2451><s%> he established <S%H3559><s%> the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
By his knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> the depths <S%H8415><s%> were broken up, <S%H1234><s%> and the skies <S%H7834><s%> drop down <S%H7491><s%> the dew. <S%H2919><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> let them not depart <S%H3868><s%> from your eyes. <S%H5869><s%> Keep <S%H5341><s%> sound wisdom <S%H8454><s%> and discretion: <S%H8454><s%>
so they will be life <S%H2416><s%> to your soul, <S%H5315><s%> and grace <S%H2580><s%> for your neck. <S%H1621><s%>
Then you shall walk <S%H3212><s%> in your way <S%H1870><s%> securely. <S%H983><s%> Your foot <S%H7272><s%> won't <S%H5062><s%> stumble.
When you lie down, <S%H7901><s%> you will not be afraid. <S%H6342><s%> Yes, <S%H7901><s%> you will lie down, and your sleep <S%H8142><s%> will be sweet. <S%H6149><s%>
Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid of sudden <S%H6597><s%> fear, <S%H6343><s%> neither of the desolation <S%H7722><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> when it comes: <S%H935><s%>
for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will be your confidence, <S%H3689><s%> and will keep <S%H8104><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> from being taken. <S%H3921><s%>
Don't <S%H4513><s%> withhold good <S%H2896><s%> from those to whom it is due, <S%H1167><s%> when it is in the power <S%H410><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%> to do it. <S%H6213><s%>

Don't <S%H559><s%> say to your neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> "Go, <S%H3212><s%> and come again; <S%H7725><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> it to you, <S%H3426><s%>" when you have it by you.
Don't <S%H2790><s%> devise evil <S%H7451><s%> against your neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> since he dwells <S%H3427><s%> securely by you. <S%H983><s%>
Don't <S%H7378><s%> strive with a man <S%H120><s%> without cause, <S%H2600><s%> if he has done <S%H1580><s%> you no harm. <S%H7451><s%>
Don't <S%H7065><s%> envy the man of violence. <S%H376><s%> Choose <S%H977><s%> none of his ways. <S%H1870><s%>
For the perverse <S%H3868><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> but his friendship <S%H5475><s%> is with the upright. <S%H3477><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s curse <S%H3994><s%> is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> but he blesses <S%H1288><s%> the habitation <S%H5116><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
Surely he mocks <S%H3887><s%> the mockers, <S%H3887><s%> but he gives <S%H5414><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> to the humble. <S%H6035><s%>
The wise <S%H2450><s%> will inherit <S%H5157><s%> glory, <S%H3519><s%> but shame <S%H7036><s%> will be the promotion <S%H7311><s%> of fools. <S%H3684><s%>
